trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Cherwell | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Cherwell | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Cherwell with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Cherwell with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Cherwell.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Cherwell.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A Cherwell single sign-on enabled subscription
trans-unit.target: A Cherwell single sign-on enabled subscription

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Cherwell will be able to single sign into the application at your Cherwell company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Cherwell will be able to single sign into the application at your Cherwell company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Cherwell
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Cherwell

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Cherwell.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Cherwell.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Applications</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Applications</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Add at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add application</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add application</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type Cherwell.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type Cherwell.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Cherwell</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Cherwell</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select Cherwell, and then click Complete to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select Cherwell, and then click Complete to add the application.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Cherwell with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Cherwell with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the Cherwell application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the Cherwell application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the How would you like users to sign on to Cherwell page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the How would you like users to sign on to Cherwell page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure App URL page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the Configure App URL page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Sign On URL textbox, type the URL used by your users to sign into your Cherwell (e.g.: https://pictdev.cherwellondemand.com/cherwellclient).
trans-unit.target: In the Sign On URL textbox, type the URL used by your users to sign into your Cherwell (e.g.: https://pictdev.cherwellondemand.com/cherwellclient).

trans-unit.source: Click Next
trans-unit.target: Click Next

trans-unit.source: On the Configure single sign-on at Cherwell page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the Configure single sign-on at Cherwell page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Download certificate, and then save the certificate locally on your computer.
trans-unit.target: Click Download certificate, and then save the certificate locally on your computer.

trans-unit.source: Copy the Identity Provider URL.
trans-unit.target: Copy the Identity Provider URL.

trans-unit.source: Copy the Single Sign-On Service URL.
trans-unit.target: Copy the Single Sign-On Service URL.

trans-unit.source: Click Next.
trans-unit.target: Click Next.

trans-unit.source: Submit the downloaded certificate, the Identity Provider URL and the Single Sign-On Service URL to your Cherwell support team.
trans-unit.target: Submit the downloaded certificate, the Identity Provider URL and the Single Sign-On Service URL to your Cherwell support team.

trans-unit.source: Your Cherwell support team has to do the actual SSO configuration.
trans-unit.target: Your Cherwell support team has to do the actual SSO configuration.

trans-unit.source: You will get a notification when SSO has been enabled for your subscription.
trans-unit.target: You will get a notification when SSO has been enabled for your subscription.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Cherwell, they must be provisioned into Cherwell.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Cherwell, they must be provisioned into Cherwell.

trans-unit.source: In the case of Cherwell, the user accounts need to be created by your Cherwell support team.
trans-unit.target: In the case of Cherwell, the user accounts need to be created by your Cherwell support team.

trans-unit.source: You can use any other Cherwell user account creation tools or APIs provided by Cherwell to provision Azure Active Directory user accounts.
trans-unit.target: You can use any other Cherwell user account creation tools or APIs provided by Cherwell to provision Azure Active Directory user accounts.

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the Cherwell **application integration page, click **Assign users.
trans-unit.target: On the Cherwell **application integration page, click **Assign users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Assign Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Yes</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Yes</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
